name: A Pixel Adventure: The Rising of Adenocarcinoma Phase IV
name_original: A Pixel Adventure: The Rising of Adenocarcinoma Phase IV
description:
Your mission to defeat Cancer, in its 4 phases, calls itself Adenocarcinoma, and has taken one of the most important people in your life.

The final adventure in 32 pixels, enter the depths of the castle "Adenocarcinoma", defeat the bosses of each dungeon to obtain different weapons, unlock new skills.

40 dungeons, full of enemies await you on an epic journey to end the evil that has taken over the castle.

Use the knives, the cross and the bombs to unlock different areas of the dungeons and grab the booty, which will help you buy swords and armor.
